title: Battle Tank - 4 : Sound System
description: Battle Tank - 4 Sound System is the result of the joint work of our experienced programmers and sound designers. More than 90 Challenger 2 engine and weapon sounds with all the necessary code
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO | HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER


The Battle Tank - 4 : Sound System is an all-encompassing audio solution designed specifically for the iconic third-generation British main battle tank. More than just a sound library, this product is a fully prepared package complete with the necessary code for seamless integration into the Unreal Engine, allowing you to effortlessly incorporate realistic audio into your projects.


  • Fully controllable 3d-model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, gear and other vehicle's parameters
  • Weapon sounds from the weapons used by this vehicle in real life
  • Different sounds from different distance
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication


The Battle Tank - 4 : Sound System immerses you in the world of armored warfare, and the sounds authentically capture both the exterior presence and the interior cabin experience of the tank. Experience the commanding presence of the 120mm rifled tank gun, the rhythmic chatter of the 7.62mm coaxial chain gun, and the strategic deployment of the smoke grenade launcher, designed to conceal the tank from prying enemy eyes. 57 engine sounds and over 30 weapon-specific sounds have been masterfully integrated for a true-to-life combat experience.


Our comprehensive solution includes advanced code that dynamically adjusts sound parameters based on in-game variables such as distance from objects, vehicle speed, engine RPMs, and more not only for single-player, but also for multiplayer. This ensures a truly immersive audio environment that adapts seamlessly to the evolving conditions of the battlefield.


For UE version 5.3 and below, you can download the demo scene from here. For UE 5.4 and above, the demo scene is already included in the plugin. You just need to adjust the audio settings of the project as shown in the 'How to Use' video.
technicalDetails:
Code Module:Â Tank_4_Sound_System (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 6

Number of C++ Classes: 6

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER: VIDEO

  • Enable "Tank_4_Sound_System" and "ChaosVehiclesPlugin" from "Edit > Plugins". Restart UE
  • Adjust the audio settings of the project as shown in the 'How to Use' video
  • Open 'DemoLevel' from '/Engine/Plugins/Tank_4_Sound_System Content/DemoLevel/DemoLevel.umap'. For UE 5.3 and below you need to download it.
  • DRIVE!!!


Check Tank_4_SFXComponent_BP to adjust any Tank's sound settings.


Support: info@soundfx.studio

Discord: https://discord.gg/HzVuvSuCHr

releaseInfo.releaseNote: UE5.4 update + some fixes. The demo level is included in the plugin.
